comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Looks like this is Valeria Bastelova marrying her fiance, Serbian army Captain Miodrag J. Stevanovich at the Russian Cathedral of St. Nicholas in New York City on March 20, 1915. They met in a military hospital in Belgrade 2 years prior, where he was a patient. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9D06E5D61439EF32A... The Cathedral looks pretty much the same today:

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artolog:  Thanks for the additional information. We'll include some of it next time we update.
